partners.v1: Receive extra income today helping your friends and family!
partners.v2: Sign up as a BMF Foundation partner, share your experience with your friends or website audience and get paid each time they join.<hr>No extra fees applied to either side.
partners.v3: How does the partner program work?
partners.v5: Place the referral link on your website or send it to your friends.
partners.v6: All successful transactions through the referral program are 25% off.
partners.v7: You get a revenue share of 10% from all the fees we charge.
partners.v9: Our referral program is 100% secure and doesn’t compromise your account or all the participants’ funds.
partners.v11: With new features to estimate and grow outgoing traffic
